title: ASL American Sign Language
description:
Knowing American sign language (ASL) will enable you to meet and interact with a whole new group of people.
It is our goal to deliver a convenient, enjoyable, learning experience that goes beyond the basics.
FEATURES
1 It is Free.
2 Not mixing with your privacy, no extra permissions.
1 American Sign Language (ASL) History
2 Learn Alphabets A-Z
3 Learn Numbers 1-9
4 Commonly used phrases in conversations and vocabulary.
5 100 Basic Signs with Video: Family signs, Place signs, time signs and many more.
6 Play ASL(Words) Picture Matching game.
7 Play ASL( Numbers) Picture Matching game.
8 Facts and Figures about American sign language (ASL)
9 Feedback
Note. New updates are coming soon (ASL Jokes, Wallpapers, Quizzes, Games). You can send us your suggestions through feedback.
